tool_description: It provides currency exchange rates from reuters: spot, bid, ask among other useful information
name: Reuters Exchange Rates
title: Reuters Exchange Rates

api_list.name: HKD rates
api_list.description: This endpoint provides the HKD rates against the most important currencies (USD,GBP,JPY,AUD...)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reuters-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com/hkd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reuters-exchange-rates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Any Currency Pair
api_list.description: It returns the exchange rate between two currecies defined in the parameters 'from' and 'to'
